Definition at line 129 of file file_input_view.php.

            {
                  try
                  {
                        $FileInputAlgorithms = get_package( 'file_input::file_input_algorithms' , 'last' , __FILE__ );
                        $FileDescription = $FileInputAlgorithms->get_by_id( $this->Security->get_gp( 'fid' , 'integer' ) );
                        
                        $FileSize = filesize( get_field( $FileDescription , 'file_path' ) );
                        $FileName = get_field( $FileDescription , 'original_file_name' );
                        
                        header( 'HTTP/1.0 200 OK' );
                        header( 'Content-type: application/octet-stream' );
                        header( "Content-Length: $FileSize" );
                        header( "Content-Disposition: attachment; filename=\"$FileName\"" );
                        header( 'Connection: close' );
                        
                        readfile( get_field( $FileDescription , 'file_path' ) );
                  }
                  catch( Exception $e )
                  {
                        $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
                  }
            }
